Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: PRIME Z690-A
Part Number: 90MB18L0-M0AAY0


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700* Designed with dual mounting holes compatible with both Intel LGA1700 and LGA1200 cooling brackets.
CPU Type: Supports 13th / 12th Gen Intel Core Processors, Pentium Gold and Celeron Processors**May require a BIOS update to boot the 13th gen Intel® Core™ desktop processors. Visit: https://www.asus.com/news/oujwh1old5n6oglf/* Refer to www.asus.com for CPU support list.
Supported CPU Technologies: Supports Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 and Intel Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0** Intel Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0 support depends on the CPU types.


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z690


Onboard Video
Onboard Video Chipset: Supported only by CPU with integrated graphic


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 6000(OC) / 5800(OC) / 5600(OC) / 5400(OC) / 5200(OC) / 5000(OC) / 4800* Refer to www.asus.com for the Memory QVL (Qualified Vendors Lists).
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express 5.0 x16* Actual support may vary by CPU.* Please check PCIe bifurcation table in support site.
PCI Express 3.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express 3.0 x16* Supports x4 mode.
PCI Express x4: 1 x PCI Express 3.0 x4
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCIe 3.0 x1


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: Intel 12th Gen Processors:M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280/22110 - Intel 12th Gen processors support PCIe 4.0 x4 mode. Intel Z690 Chipset:** M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)M.2_3 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280/22110 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)M.2_4 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 & SATA modes)* Intel Rapid Storage Technology supports NVMe RAID 0/1/5, SATA RAID 0/1/5/10.** Intel Rapid Storage Technology supports Intel Optane Memory H Series on PCH attached M.2 slots.
Intel Optane Ready: Yes


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek S1220A
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: Intel 2.5Gb Ethernet
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 port(s) (1 x USB Type-C)3 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 port(s) (2 x Type-A, 1 x Type-C )4 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 port(s) (4 x Type-A)1 x DisplayPort1 x HDMI port1 x Intel 2.5Gb Ethernet port5 x Audio jacks 1 x Optical S/PDIF out port


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 connector (support(s) USB Type-C) 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 header(s) support(s) additional 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports2 x USB 2.0 header(s) support(s) additional 4 USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan and Cooling related 1 x 4-pin CPU Fan header(s)1 x 4-pin CPU OPT Fan header(s)1 x 4-pin AIO Pump header(s)4 x 4-pin Chassis Fan header(s)1 x W_PUMP+ header(s)Miscellaneous3 x Addressable Gen 2 header(s)1 x AURA RGB header(s)1 x Clear CMOS button1 x COM Port header1 x CPU Over Voltage jumper1 x Front Panel Audio header (AAFP) 1 x Power button 1 x SPI TPM header (14-1pin)1 x 20-3 pin System Panel header with Chassis intrude function1 x Thermal Sensor header1 x Thunderbolt  header


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: RGB
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin Main Power connector2 x 8-pin +12V Power connector


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: Special Features:ASUS 5X PROTECTION III - DIGI+ VRM (- Digital power design with DrMOS)- Enhanced DRAM Overcurrent Protection- ESD Guards - LANGuard - Overvoltage Protection- SafeSlot - Stainless-Steel Back I/OASUS Q-Design - M.2 Q-Latch- Q-Connector- Q-DIMM- Q-LED (CPU [red], DRAM [yellow], VGA [white], Boot Device [yellow green])- Q-SlotASUS Thermal Solution- M.2 heatsink backplate- M.2 heatsink- VRM heatsink design ASUS EZ DIY- Box headers- Clear CMOS button- CPU socket lever protector- ProCool - Pre-mounted I/O shieldAURA Sync- AURA RGB header(s)- Addressable Gen 2 header(s)Software Features:ASUS Exclusive SoftwareArmoury Crate- AURA Creator- AURA Sync- Fan Xpert 4 - Two-Way AI Noise CancelationAI Suite 3- 5-Way Optimization with AI Overclocking TPU EPU DIGI+ VRMTurbo app ASUS CPU-Z DTS:X Ultra Norton Anti-virus software (Free Trial version) WinRARUEFI BIOSAI Overclocking GuideASUS EZ DIY - ASUS CrashFree BIOS 3 - ASUS EZ Flash 3 - ASUS UEFI BIOS EZ ModeFlexKeyBIOS:256 Mb Flash ROM, UEFI AMI BIOSManageability:WOL by PME, PXE Operating System:Windows 11 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
